actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Power Act to direct the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend until December 31, 2002, the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Pennsylvania.Provides for license reinstatement if the license for the project has expired before the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Pennsylvania.
